summary: An American journalist returns to Paris - a city that gave him true love and deep grief.
cast: Elizabeth Taylor|Van Johnson|Walter Pidgeon|Donna Reed|Eva Gabor|Kurt Kasznar|George Dolenz|Roger Moore|Sandy Descher|Celia Lovsky|Peter Leeds|John Doucette|Odette Myrtil|Jacqueline Allen|Don Anderson|Max Barwyn|Herman Belmonte|Danny Borzage|Peter Bourne|Paul Bradley|Tex Brodus|Tim Cagney|Peter Camlin|Charles Cirillo|Ann Codee|Harry Cody|Louise Colombet|Gene Coogan|Paul Cristo|Gabriel Curtiz|Albert D'Arno|John Damler|Roy Damron|Marcel De la Brosse|Josette Deegan|Jean Del Val|Paul Dubov|Arthur Dulac|Ken DuMain|Norman Dupont|Jay Eaton|Richard Emory|John Charles Farrow|Gilda Fontana|Joel Friend|James Gonzalez|Dick Gordon|Alvin Greenman|Stuart Hall|Mary Ann Hawkins|Jean Heremans|Ed Hinton|James Hyland|Don Kennedy|Maurice Marks|Paul McGuire|Louis Mercier|Steve Mitchell|Matt Moore|Alberto Morin|Leonidas Ossetynski|Manuel París|Christian Pasques|Danik Patisson|Murray Pollack|Tao Porchon|Paul Power|Anthony Redondo|Fay Roope|Joe Rubino|Loulette Sablon|Dick Simmons|Angela Stevens|Lomax Study|Luis Urbina|Maya Van Horn|Bruno VeSota|Steve Wayne
title: La última vez que vi París
